location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Mohumed bin Suleeman, Commanding His Highness's Fleet

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top right (recto) or top left (verso) corner of the folio. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right corner (recto) only, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered from very slight insect damage and there are a few small holes throughout the text, though not obscuring it.

mods.abstract: The letter includes a plea by Stannus to deliver up goods belonging to the merchants of Bushire without exacting duty.
